top.title: US insists it authored Ukraine peace plan after claims of Russian 'wish list'
top.summary: A group of US lawmakers said the secretary of state told them the draft did not reflect Washington's position. Marco Rubio has distanced himself from those claims.

top.title: UN climate talks fail to secure new fossil fuel promises
top.summary: Nearly 200 countries attended COP30, which aimed to commit the world to take more action on climate change.

top.title: 'We worry more about food' say Venezuelans living under threat of US military action
top.summary: While the US escalates a military threat in nearby waters, Venezuelans say the real enemy of the people is a sharp rise in food prices.

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Teens plead not guilty over TfL cyber-attack
top.summary: Thalha Jubair, 19, and Owen Flowers, 18,  are charged with conspiring to commit unauthorised acts.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.

title.#text: Shocker: Elon Musk spends a lot of time on X posting bad political takes
Sony’s entire DualSense lineup is $20 off, including the limited edition models
Spotify simplifies importing playlists from other streaming services
